function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical separation in workspace","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission between occupants","Mitigation":"Implement physical barriers or separate workspaces to reduce close contact","Technologies":"Room dividers, barriers, partitions","People":"Occupants of the workspace","Owner":"Facility manager, individual occupants"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and natural light","Impact":"Reduced air quality and negative impact on mental well-being","Mitigation":"Install proper ventilation systems and maximize natural light exposure","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, skylights, windows","People":"Occupants of the workspace","Owner":"Facility manager, building owner"},{"Description":"Shared workspaces lacking visual indicators","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying personal and shared spaces, increasing close contact","Mitigation":"Use floor texture, furniture arrangement, and visual signals to define personal and shared areas","Technologies":"Flooring materials, furniture layout, visual signage","People":"Occupants of the shared workspace","Owner":"Facility manager, occupants"}]}
